testcase.name: Validate if the user can book on Hotels
testcase.system-out: Given I am on login page of Hotels..........................................passed When I go to Rehlat Home page...............................................passed When I can click on hotel link..............................................passed When I can enter Hotel city name............................................passed When I can select CheckIn Date and CheckOut Date............................passed When I can select the hotel traveller Details...............................passed And I can click on Book now and Verify the Price and Dates..................passed Then I can enter hotel Traveller details....................................passed
